GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
nfc: pn533: Fix use-after-free bugs caused by pn532_cmd_timeout

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 9c34c33893db7a80d0e4b55c23d3b65e29609cfb, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit c656aa4c27b17a8c70da223ed5ab42145800d6b5. For more details please see the references link.
